thread.title: Mozambican theater commemorates Swedish author Mankell
thread.title_full: Mozambican theater commemorates Swedish author Mankell - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Christopher Torchia, Associated Press
title: Mozambican theater commemorates Swedish author Mankell
text: Photo: Jane Flood, AP The front page of a Mozambican newspaper with a portrait of Swedish author and crime writer Henning Mankell and headline "An Eternal Gratitude". Mozambicans have paid tribute to the late Mankell who worked in theater and contributed to charity in Mozambique as it struggled to recover from decades of war. Mankell died Oct. 5 in Sweden after a battle with cancer. The front page of a Mozambican newspaper with a portrait of... JOHANNESBURG (AP) — Swedish crime writer Henning Mankell, a Mozambican friend said, lived with "one foot in the snow and one foot in the sand," splitting his time between Sweden and Mozambique. Mozambicans have paid tribute to the late Mankell who worked in theater and contributed to charity in Mozambique as it struggled to recover from decades of war.
